page.title: 02A General Summary
page.content: Examples of these institutions are the Horticultural Society,the playgroup,the women's institute and the church council.The Nor'lye news also contains the Vicar's letter and information about forthcoming events in the area, as well as many other things.North Leigh is a mixture of old and new houses.In North Leigh there is a hall called the Memorial hall.Its where meetings and discos take place. Attached to the hall is North Leigh library.Also in North Leigh there are 3 churches and a garden centre. I like North Leigh because its in the country however I have not got many friends there. by THOMAS LALLY.
